Title: Felonius Monk
Plot: Grissom investigates the murders of four monks who were shot point blank while chanting in a Buddhist temple; Catherine reopens a cold case in which her best friend was murdered, after the man convicted of the crime claims he's innocent shortly before he dies.
GuestStars: Bruce McGill, Mark Dacascos, Marshall Bell, Aaron Paul, Jusak Yang Bernhard, Michael DeLano, Koji Kataoka, Steven Kozlowski, Kimberly Lyon, Gregory Onga, Woon Young Park, Randy Thompson, Eck Stone, Nicholas Sadle
